saas.name: imagemin
saas.heading: **Reduce image sizes by up to 60%**
saas.subheading: Lightning-fast API to serve optimized versions of any image asset, in any environment.

features.name: Minify any image
features.desc: Reduce image sizes for PNGs, JPEGs, GIFs and more by up to 60%.

features.name: Lightning-fast
features.desc: Industry leading image processing times mean you'll never wait long.

features.name: Reduce costs
features.desc: Image processing at scale is expensive. We'll handle that; you focus on your business.

features.name: Free to try
features.desc: 100 images / mo for free, then only pay for what you use. See [our pricing](/pricing).

features.name: Plugin ecosystem
features.desc: Leverage an ecosystem with [dozens of plugins](https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=keywords:imageminplugin), from pngquant to gifsicle.

features.name: Support open source
features.desc: Profits support the authors of [imagemin](https://www.github.com/imagemin/imagemin), the popular Node.js lib with 3,000,000+ monthly downloads!
